#include <stdio.h>
#include <limits.h>
#include <queue>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <time.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <stack>
#include <map>
#include <string>
#include <malloc.h>
using namespace std;

class Solution {
public:
};

struct Order
{
    bool operator()(pair<long long  int, long long int> const& a, pair< long long int, long long int> const& b) const
    {
        if(a.first==b.first)
        {
          return a.second < b.second;
        }
        return a.first > b.first;
        
    }
};


 int main()
{
    long long int n,k;
    cin >>n >> k;
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    std::vector<int> v(3,0);
    map <string,int> m;
    m["a"] =0;
    m["b"] =1;
    m["c"] =2;
    string ans ="";
    for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
    {
        for(int j=i;j<s.size();j+=k)
        {
            string t;
            t = s[j];
            v[m[t]]++;
        }
        if(v[0]>=v[1] && v[0]>=v[2])
        {
            ans+="a";
        }
        else if (v[1]>=v[0] && v[1]>=v[2])
        {
            ans+="b";
        }
        else if(v[2]>=v[0] && v[2]>=v[1])
        {
            ans+="c";
        }
        v[0] =v[1] =v[2] =0;
    }
    cout << ans;
    return 0;
}
